deduplicateHint.message: when turned on, if you try to navigate to a website you already have open, $APP_NAME$ will undo the navigation and show you the original tab instead (unless it was a blank new tab, in which case we close it for you)
deduplicateHint.description: A hint to explain the tab deduplicate feature to the user, displayed on hover over the deduplicate label

deduplicateLabel.message: focus existing tabs instead of opening new ones $RECYCLE_EMOJI$
deduplicateLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox to enable/disable the tab focus+deduplicate feature

closeDuplicateLabel.message: close duplicates when navigating to existing tabs $BROOM_EMOJI$
closeDuplicateLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox which is a child of the deduplicate checkbox, to enable/disable closing of duplicate tabs after focusing them

closeDuplicateHint.message: if you were navigating from "$1" to "$2" in one tab, and "$2" was already open in another, the "$1" tab would be closed
closeDuplicateHint.description: A hint to explain the close duplicate feature to the user, displayed on hover over the close duplicate label

hideTabsLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a check to enable feature to hide/group tabs after a certain time, with a box to its other side to enter the time (followed by another label)

hideTabsHint.message: you can choose to tuck away your neglected tabs until you're ready to see them again
hideTabsHint.description: A hint to explain the hide tabs feature to the user, displayed on hover over the hide tabs label

groupNameLabel.description: Visible label succeeding a box to enter the number of days to group tabs, followed by a box to enter the name of the group

groupNameHint.message: if the group doesn't already exist, it will be created for you
groupNameHint.description: A hint to explain more about the group name feature to the user, displayed on hover over the group name label

groupNameDefault.description: The default value for the group name input box, to be used as a group for storing tabs which the user hasn't interacted with in awhile

closeTabsHint.message: $APP_NAME$ can also clean up any pages you haven't looked at in awhile (don't worry, you won't miss them)
closeTabsHint.description: A hint to explain the close tabs feature to the user, displayed on hover over the close tabs label

closeTabsLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox to enable/disable the feature to close tabs after a certain time, with a box to its other side to enter the time

closeTabsTimeUnit.description: Visible label to follow the value entered in a number input to indicate the limit on number of days a tab can be open without activity before it is closed

linkCopiedToClipboardSuccess.description: A message to popover the share button when the link for sharing is successfully copied to the clipboard

linkCopiedToClipboardError.description: A message to popover the share button when the link for sharing fails to be copied to the clipboard

sharePruneTitle.description: Title for the share prune dialog

sharePruneText.message: Help a friend prune their tabs
sharePruneText.description: Text for the share prune dialog

shareTooltipTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the share icon button

githubTooltipTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the GitHub icon button

creatorTooltipTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the creator icon button

leastRecentlyUsedTabsLabelAction.description: Action text (close) prefixing the leastRecentlyUsedTabsLabel when there is no tab grouping feature support in the browser

leastRecentlyUsedTabsLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox (and potentially a dropdown or single option named 'close') to enable/disable closing least recently used tabs once they reach a certain number, with a box to its other side to enter the number

leastRecentlyUsedTabsSizeLabel.description: Visible label to follow the value entered in a number input to indicate the limit on number of tabs that can be open before the user chosen action is taken

leastRecentlyUsedTabsHint.message: you can let $APP_NAME$ group or close your oldest tabs once you go over your limit
leastRecentlyUsedTabsHint.description: A hint to explain the least recently used tabs feature to the user, displayed on hover over the least recently used tabs label

leastRecentlyUsedTabsDestinationGroup.description: Value of a select option to choose to send least recently used tabs to a tab group

leastRecentlyUsedTabsDestinationClose.description: Value of a select option to choose to close least recently used tabs

bookmarkLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox to enable/disable the bookmark feature, with a box to its other side to enter the name of the folder

bookmarkHint.message: if you're afraid of losing your tabs forever, $APP_NAME$ can store them as bookmarks before closing them
bookmarkHint.description: A hint to explain the bookmark feature to the user, displayed on hover over the bookmark label

optionsTitle.description: Title for the 'options' section in the extension popup, which contains all the settings to configure the extension

aboutTitle.description: Title for the 'about' section in the extension popup, which contains information about the extension and its creator, as well as buttons to tip the author and review the extension

aboutTextStart.message: is a free, open-source browser extension made by
aboutTextStart.description: Text to introduce the creator of the extension in the about section of the extension popup (followed by the creator's name)

aboutTextEnd.message: to help make your browsing less cluttered and more productive.
aboutTextEnd.description: Text to conclude the about section of the extension popup (preceded by the creator's name)

tipButtonText.description: Text for the button to send a monetary donation to the author of the extension

tipButtonHint.message: i'll probably survive without it, but still appreciate the support!
tipButtonHint.description: A hint to happily elaborate that tips are not necessary, but still appreciated, displayed on hover over the tip button

reviewButtonText.description: Text for the button to leave a review for the extension

reviewButtonHint.message: but please don't make fun of how much i like box shadows $PUPPY_DOG_EYES_EMOJI$
reviewButtonHint.description: A hint to jokingly be vulnerable in encouraging users for primarily positive feedback, displayed on hover over the review button

useSyncStorageHint.message: use the same tab history across all your devices, keeping tabs around when you've viewed them elsewhere (note: may not work as intended depending on tab volume/activity)
useSyncStorageHint.description: A hint to explain the experimental feature to synchronize tab activity across devices, displayed on hover over the use sync storage label

useSyncStorageLabel.message: sync tab activity across your devices $SYNC_EMOJI$
useSyncStorageLabel.description: A label to enable/disable the experimental feature to synchronize tab activity across devices

advancedSettingsLabel.description: A label to toggle the advanced settings section in the options

advancedSettingsHint.message: if you're feeling brave, you can check out some of the more experimental features of $APP_NAME$
advancedSettingsHint.description: A hint to explain the advanced settings feature to the user, displayed on hover over the advanced settings label

exemptPagesLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a box to enter a list of URLs to exempt from the tab pruning

exemptPagesHint.message: if you want $APP_NAME$ to leave your tabs alone for specific websites, you can add them here
exemptPagesHint.description: A hint to explain the exempt pages feature to the user, displayed on hover over the exempt pages label

exemptPagesInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the input box to enter URLs to exempt from the tab pruning

productivityModeLabel.description: Visible label displayed next to a checkbox to enable/disable the productivity mode feature

productivityModeHint.message: helps keep your browsing productive by making it harder for you to open time-wasting websites (of your choosing)
productivityModeHint.description: A hint to explain the productivity mode feature to the user, displayed on hover over the productivity mode label

productivityModeInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the input box to enter URLs to block in productivity mode

pageLockedTitle.description: Title for the page locked dialog

pageLockedDialog.message: This website can't be accessed right now because you're in productivity mode. You can make a temporary exception if you really want to, but you should probably just go back to being productive. üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
pageLockedDialog.description: Text for the page locked dialog

beProductiveButtonText.description: Text for the button to go back to being productive in the page locked dialog

beProductiveButtonHint.message: for now this just takes you back to your last unproductive tab (if you have one), maybe one day it'll be more interesting
beProductiveButtonHint.description: A hint to explain the be productive button in the page locked dialog, displayed on hover over the button

pageLockedOptionSeparatorText.description: Text to separate the two options in the page locked dialog

unlockButtonText.description: Text for the button to unlock the page in the page locked dialog

pageLockedTimeSelectorPrecursor.description: Text to precede the time selector in the page locked dialog

fifteenMinutesText.description: Text for the 15 minutes option in the time selector in the page locked dialog

oneHourText.description: Text for the 1 hour option in the time selector in the page locked dialog

oneDayText.description: Text for the 1 day option in the time selector in the page locked dialog
